text: Stacey Plaskett (born May 13, 1966) is an American politician, lawyer and commentator. She is the fifth delegate for the United States House of Representatives from the United States Virgin Islands' at large congressional district. Plaskett is a member of the Democratic Party. Plaskett has practiced law in New York City, Washington, D.C. and the U.S. Virgin Islands. Plaskett was born in Brooklyn, New York. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:African-American politicians Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Brooklyn Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:Living people
title: Stacey Plaskett
